advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Going to the playoff game? Make your trip to the ballpark the best experience!

editorialNotes.standard: Football, soccer, basketball, baseball, cricket, Formula 1, tennis, golf, boxing, mixed martial arts. Regardless of what sports you follow, the ESPN app can keep you in the loop with up-to-the-minute scores, breaking news on signings and trades, and insightful analysis on matchups and drafts.

It’s a social network for anglers. That means lots of people posting pictures of themselves with shockingly giant halibut—and it also means the app is packed to the, uh, gills with tips on local hot spots, advice on bait and gear, and even the ability to ID any fish you’ve caught simply by snapping a photo of it.

We were hoping to avoid making baseball puns, but here’s the problem: The MLB app really does knock it out of the park. It’s a great way to preview the day’s matchups, buy tickets to a game, and follow along via live pitch tracking and high-resolution ballpark renderings.

editorialNotes.short: Subscribe to watch the season live.
